validationErrs.usernameConditions: يجب أن يكون اسم المستخدم أبجديًا رقميًا ويمكن أن يحتوي على شرطة سفلية فقط

errors.userInBlockedList: This user is in your block list, please remove the user from the list to perform this action
errors.notAuthorizedForAddConnection: There is some issue while sending connection request to this user, please try again later
errors.notAuthorizedToFollow: There is some issue while following this user, please try again later
errors.existingOrderInProgress: You have an existing order for which payment is in progress. Please wait for sometime or contact Admin in case you have any concerns.
errors.subscriptionNotFoundOrAlreadyCancel: Subscription not found or already cancelled
errors.blockedByAdmin: Your account has been suspended. Please contact Administrator
errors.addArtworkLimitExceed: Your current plan does not allow to add more that 5 artworks. Please upgrade your account.
errors.currentSubscriptionPaymentPending: Your payment for the current subscription is pending. Please contact Administrator.
errors.notAuthorizedForQuickEditArtwork: You are not authorized to quick edit the artwork
errors.notAuthorizedToAccessPage: You are not authorized to access this page
errors.subscriptionExists: You already have an active subscription
errors.noPicsFound: You have not uploaded any photos yet

signUpExpire.userNameNotFound: You are already logged in, please click
signUpExpire.userNameFound1: You are already logged in as username -
signUpExpire.commonText: to continue to your profile. In case you have registered as a new user and this is not your profile, please log out from the profile page and try again.
